Symbol.Script_3D:
! Service Sink
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
IF useSysMat THEN MainBoxMaterial = sMat MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
! --- SERVICE SINK --- !
unID = 1 HOTSPOT -A/2, 0, ZZYZX-sinkDepth, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, 0, ZZYZX-sinkDepth, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT -A/2, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, -B, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, -B, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT -A/2, 0, -sinkDepth, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, 0, -sinkDepth, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, -B, -sinkDepth, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, -B, -sinkDepth, unID: unID=unID+1
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN ! Detailed
ROTx 90 PRISM 4,backThick, -A/2+edgeThick, -sinkDepth, -A/2+edgeThick, ZZYZX-sinkDepth, A/2-edgeThick, ZZYZX-sinkDepth, A/2-edgeThick, -sinkDepth DEL 1
PUT -A/2+edgeThick, 0, 1 da=360/res alpha=270 FOR i=1 TO res/4+1 PUT -A/2+edgeThick+R + R*SIN(alpha), -B+edgeThick+R - R*COS(alpha), 1 alpha=alpha+da NEXT i alpha=180 FOR i=1 TO res/4+1 PUT A/2-edgeThick-R - R*SIN(alpha), -B+edgeThick+R + R*COS(alpha), 1 alpha=alpha+da NEXT i PUT A/2-edgeThick, 0, 1
CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, ConPosX_3,ConPosY_3,915, ConWidth_3/2,360,4015
ADDz -sinkDepth POLY_ NSP/3,GET(NSP) DEL 1 CUTEND
PUT -A/2+edgeThick,1,0,0, -A/2+edgeThick, 0, 0, 0
da=360/res alpha=270 FOR i=1 TO res/4+1 PUT -A/2+edgeThick+R + R*SIN(alpha), -B+edgeThick+R - R*COS(alpha), 0,0 alpha=alpha+da NEXT i alpha=180 FOR i=1 TO res/4+1 PUT A/2-edgeThick-R - R*SIN(alpha), -B+edgeThick+R + R*COS(alpha), 0,0 alpha=alpha+da NEXT i
PUT A/2-edgeThick, 0, 0, 0, A/2-edgeThick,1,0,0
RESOL 8 TUBE 6, NSP/4, 1+2+16+32, 0,-sinkDepth, 0, 0,-edgeThick, 1, -edgeThick/2,-edgeThick, 901, -edgeThick/2-edgeThick/2*SIN(45),-edgeThick-edgeThick/2*COS(45), 1001, -EPS,-edgeThick, 1, -EPS,-sinkDepth, 1, GET(NSP)
ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN ! Simple
ROTx 90 PRISM 4,backThick, -A/2+edgeThick, -sinkDepth, -A/2+edgeThick, ZZYZX-sinkDepth, A/2-edgeThick, ZZYZX-sinkDepth, A/2-edgeThick, -sinkDepth DEL 1
res2 = 4
PUT -A/2+edgeThick, 0, 1 da=360/res2 alpha=270 FOR i=1 TO res2/4+1 PUT -A/2+edgeThick+R + R*SIN(alpha), -B+edgeThick+R - R*COS(alpha), 1 alpha=alpha+da NEXT i alpha=180 FOR i=1 TO res2/4+1 PUT A/2-edgeThick-R - R*SIN(alpha), -B+edgeThick+R + R*COS(alpha), 1 alpha=alpha+da NEXT i PUT A/2-edgeThick, 0, 1
ADDz -sinkDepth POLY_ NSP/3,GET(NSP) DEL 1
PUT -A/2+edgeThick,1,0,0, -A/2+edgeThick, 0, 0, 0
da=360/res2 alpha=270 FOR i=1 TO res2/4+1 PUT -A/2+edgeThick+R + R*SIN(alpha), -B+edgeThick+R - R*COS(alpha), 0,0 alpha=alpha+da NEXT i alpha=180 FOR i=1 TO res2/4+1 PUT A/2-edgeThick-R - R*SIN(alpha), -B+edgeThick+R + R*COS(alpha), 0,0 alpha=alpha+da NEXT i
PUT A/2-edgeThick, 0, 0, 0, A/2-edgeThick,1,0,0
RESOL 4 TUBE 6, NSP/4, 1+2+16+32, 0,-sinkDepth, 0, 0,-edgeThick, 1, -edgeThick/2,-edgeThick, 901, -edgeThick/2-edgeThick/2*SIN(45),-edgeThick-edgeThick/2*COS(45), 1001, -EPS,-edgeThick, 1, -EPS,-sinkDepth, 1, GET(NSP) ENDIF
RESOL res ADD (ConPosX_1 + ConPosX_2)/2, -0.05, (ConPosZ_1 + ConPosZ_2)/2 GOSUB 1000 DEL 1
DEL TOP RESOL res
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 16, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 16, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 15 END
1000: ! Tap
tx = ABS(ConPosX_1 - ConPosX_2)/2 bx = 0.006 by = 0.030
FOR i=1 TO 2 ADDx -tx ROTx 90 CYLIND 0.05,0.015 ADDz 0.02 IF tx>0.015 THEN ARMC 0.015, 0.015, tx, 0,0,90 ENDIF ADDz 0.035 ROTz i*15 PRISM 12,0.007, -bx,bx, -bx,by, bx,by, bx,bx, by,bx, by,-bx, bx,-bx, bx,-by, -bx,-by, -bx,-bx, -by,-bx, -by, bx DEL 5
MULX -1 NEXT i DEL 2
ADDy -0.02 ROTy -90 ARMC 0.015, 0.015, 0.02, 0,0,90 DEL 1 ROTx 90 ROTy -90 ADDz -0.01 PRISM_ 10,0.02, 0.147986393591, 0.09234439178515, 15, 0.04117544321573, 0.09234439178515, 79, -0.01198261107796, 0.04424275934702, 79, -0.01198261107796, 0.02, 15, 0.01198261107796, 0.02, 15, 0.01198261107796, 0.04424275934702, 79, 0.04737063515823, 0.07626465611579, 79, 0.127986393591, 0.07626465611579, 15, 0.127986393591, 0.05893770166193, 15, 0.147986393591, 0.05893770166193, 15 DEL 4
RETURN
Symbol.Script_2D:
! Service Sink
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
unID = 1 DrawingNum = 1 IF DrawingNum = 1 THEN ! Top
! --- SERVICE SINK --- !
HOTSPOT2 -A/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2, -B, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, -B, unID: unID=unID+1
IF GLOB_CONTEXT <> 22 THEN POLY2_B 6, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -A/2,0, 1, -A/2,-B+edgeThick+R, 1, -A/2+edgeThick+R,-B, 1001, A/2-edgeThick-R,-B, 1, A/2,-B+edgeThick+R, 1001, A/2,0, 1 POLY2_B 6, 1+4, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -A/2+edgeThick,0, 1, -A/2+edgeThick,-B+edgeThick+R, 1, -A/2+edgeThick+R,-B+edgeThick, 1001, A/2-edgeThick-R,-B+edgeThick, 1, A/2-edgeThick,-B+edgeThick+R, 1001, A/2-edgeThick,0, 1
LINE2 A/2-edgeThick,-backThick, -A/2+edgeThick,-backThick
CIRCLE2 ConPosX_3,ConPosY_3, ConWidth_3/2 ENDIF ENDIF DEL TOP
! --- OTHER VIEWS --- !
ROT2 (SYMB_MIRRORED - NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED)) * (DrawingNum > 1) * SYMB_ROTANGLE
IF DrawingNum = 2 THEN PROJECT2 -3, 90, 2 ! Bottom IF DrawingNum = 3 THEN PROJECT2 4, 270, 2 ! Front IF DrawingNum = 4 THEN PROJECT2 4, 90, 2 ! Back IF DrawingNum = 5 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180 * SYMB_MIRRORED, 2 ! Right IF DrawingNum = 6 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180 * NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Left
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = DrawingNum, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 12, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 12, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 5 DEL 1
END
Symbol.Script_1D:
! Service Sink
EPS = 0.0001
! --- HARDCODED AND DERIVED VARIABLES --- !
edgeThick = 0.03 backThick = 0.05 R = 0.04
z = 0
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
! Service Sink
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_vis_attr[4][4] FOR i = 1 TO 4 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 2 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 7
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[3] ui_con_type[1] = 0 ui_con_type[2] = 0 ui_con_type[3] = 0
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 2, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Service Sink
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 0 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
! --- MAIN PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN minW = 0.20 IF A<minW THEN A=minW PARAMETERS A=minW ENDIF VALUES "A" RANGE [minW,]
minD = 0.20 IF B<minD THEN B=minD PARAMETERS B=minD ENDIF VALUES "B" RANGE [minD,]
minH = 0.20 IF ZZYZX<minH THEN ZZYZX=minH PARAMETERS ZZYZX=minH ENDIF VALUES "ZZYZX" RANGE [minH,] ENDIF
maxSD = 2*ZZYZX/3 IF sinkDepth<EPS THEN sinkDepth=EPS PARAMETERS sinkDepth=sinkDepth ENDIF IF sinkDepth>maxSD THEN sinkDepth=maxSD PARAMETERS sinkDepth=maxSD ENDIF VALUES "sinkDepth" RANGE (0,maxSD)
! --- OBJECT SPECIFIC PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN minX = -A/2+edgeThick+ConWidth_3/2 maxX = A/2-edgeThick-ConWidth_3/2 minY = -B+edgeThick+ConWidth_3/2 maxY = -backThick-ConWidth_3/2 VALUES "ConPosX_3" RANGE [minX, maxX] VALUES "ConPosY_3" RANGE [minY, maxY] IF ConPosX_3<minX THEN ConPosX_3=minX PARAMETERS ConPosX_3=minX ENDIF IF ConPosX_3>maxX THEN ConPosX_3=maxX PARAMETERS ConPosX_3=maxX ENDIF IF ConPosY_3<minY THEN ConPosY_3=minY PARAMETERS ConPosY_3=minY ENDIF IF ConPosY_3>maxY THEN ConPosY_3=maxY PARAMETERS ConPosY_3=maxY ENDIF
maxCW = MIN(ZZYZX, A)/3 maxH = ZZYZX - sinkDepth - MIN(maxCW, MAX(ConWidth_1, ConWidth_2)) / 2 IF ConPosZ_1 > maxH OR ConPosZ_2 > maxH THEN ConPosZ_1 = maxH ConPosZ_2 = maxH PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1 = maxH PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2 = maxH ENDIF
PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3 = -sinkDepth ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 3
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConPosZ_1" THEN ConPosZ_2 = ConPosZ_1 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2 = ConPosZ_2 ENDIF IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ConPosZ_2" THEN ConPosZ_1 = ConPosZ_2 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1 = ConPosZ_1 ENDIF ENDIF
! --- COLD WATER CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Соединение Трубы - Холодная Вода`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = MIN(ZZYZX, A)/3
VALUES "ConLength_1" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_1" RANGE (0, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_1<EPS THEN ConWidth_1=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=EPS ENDIF IF ConWidth_1>maxCW THEN ConWidth_1=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=maxCW ENDIF
VALUES "ConWallThickness_1" RANGE [0, ConWidth_1/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- HOT WATER CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Соединение Трубы - Горячая Вода`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = MIN(ZZYZX, A)/3
VALUES "ConLength_2" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_2" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_2" RANGE (0, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_2<EPS THEN ConWidth_2=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_2=EPS ENDIF IF ConWidth_2>maxCW THEN ConWidth_2=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_2=maxCW ENDIF
VALUES "ConWallThickness_2" RANGE [0, ConWidth_2/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_2, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- WASTE CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 3 ConName = `Соединение Трубы - Канализация`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = -1
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = MIN(B, A)/3
VALUES "ConLength_3" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_3" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_3" RANGE (0, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_3<EPS THEN ConWidth_3=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_3=EPS ENDIF IF ConWidth_3>maxCW THEN ConWidth_3=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_3=maxCW ENDIF
PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3 = -sinkDepth
VALUES "ConWallThickness_3" RANGE [0, ConWidth_3/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_3, ConPosY = ConPosY_3, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_3, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_3, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_3, ConWidth = ConWidth_3, ConDepth = ConDepth_3, ConLength = ConLength_3, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_3, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_3, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_3, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_3, ConToolType = ConToolType_3, ConStatus = ConStatus_3, ConType_3 = ConType_3, ConConnectorType_3 = ConConnectorType_3, ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_3, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_3, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
IF setProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ENDIF
